pages.text: This powerful relic is acquired by defeating $(l:bewitchment:creatures/leonard)Leonard$().$(br2)Once acquired, it can be combined with a $(item)Splash Potion$(), which can then be thrown eight times using the Scepter.
The $(item)Scepter$() will use $(marked)ME$() to launch its potions.$(br2)It can be repaired using $(item)Netherite Ingots$().
